basic.description: A study of production and performance methods, and dramatic literature of the 20th and 21st centuries.
basic.subject: DRAM
basic.title: Theatre History & Literature II

extra.enrollment_requirement:
Prerequisites     Level 3 &(registration in a DRAM Maj or Med Plan) and (a grade of B- in each of DRAM200; 220; 240) and (a GPA of 2.6 in DRAM) or permission of the Department.
Exclusion    No more than 6.0 units from DRAM300; DRAM310; DRAM318.
